Millions of gamers are currently playing Minecraft. Whether you are a professional gamer or just getting into the gaming world, we all love to record and share interesting gaming moments on the internet. However, in order to ensure high quality content during the recording process, one needs to choose a powerful recording tool that never sacrifices video quality. If you are also looking for such recording tools, then the article below will be really useful for you. Here we have provided reviews for the best Minecraft screen recorder software programs that work on iPhone, Android, Mac and Windows platforms.

Minecraft Screen Recorder for PC and Mac:

Wondershare Demo Creator:

Wondershare DemoCreator is an incredible screen recorder and amazing video editing software. Just open the software and click the Record button. Users can start their screen recording, webcam recording and voiceover recording at the same time! It is possible to create your stories using DemoCreator’s creative tools. And you can embed many effects into your favorite recorded files for exciting results.

Advantages:

  • Record screen and webcam at the same time.
  • Offers professional editing tools to prioritize the recorded files.
  • Effects and annotation tools for your recording.
  • Possibility to record and control the recorded file.
  • The video and audio track will be separated after recording.

Disadvantages:

  • The exported videos have a watermark in the free version.

Would you like to try it? The following tutorial gives you more hints.

Bandicam (Windows):

One of the most recommended software tools for recording Minecraft videos is Bandicam. In the recording mode, the user can choose to record specific areas of the screen or record the entire screen without degrading the quality of the content. While in recording mode, Bandicam will still display the frame rate on the screen in the top left corner, but users can set preferences to hide them when not required.

Advantages:

  • Recorded videos can be saved with MP4 and AVI extension.
  • Custom screen recording adjustments.

Disadvantages:

  • Only available for Windows.

ShadowPlay (Windows):

Whether you want to enjoy live streams, capture screenshots, or record high-quality videos for your Minecraft game; ShadowPlay brings you great content quality. This software tool can automatically record all the videos in the background and when you press the record hotkey, it saves the last 30 seconds of the game recording to a specified location.

Advantages:

  • Offers 4K recording capability, which is a great idea for Minecraft players.
  • Does not affect system performance.

Disadvantages:

  • Requires higher bandwidth for transmission.

Game DVR (Windows 10):

Game DVR is the best Xbox app that works on Windows 10 platforms and offers a crisp and high-quality game video recording option. Users can access the Game Bar pop-up window on their device’s screen by simply pressing the Win+G keyboard shortcut. Can be used to record game videos with resolution settings of 1080p as well as 720p setting.

Advantages:

  • Can record both videos and screenshots.
  • Hotkeys can also be used to increase performance.
  • There are no stutters during recording.

Disadvantages:

  • Lack of advanced features available from other competitors.

OBS (Windows and Mac):

This classic screen recorder tool works on Windows, Mac as well as Linux platforms. OBS is available as an open-source tool, which is available free of charge and without any restrictions. OBS Studio offers easy recording, streaming and editing options with its interactive and user-friendly interface.

Advantages:

  • Available for free so anyone can access it to record Minecraft.
  • The length of the videos is not limited in any case.

Disadvantages:

  • Leads to higher compression of the recorded videos.

Screenflick (Mac):

This screen recorder tool focuses on Mac environment with powerful service while also recording audio and game videos for easy sharing. ScreenFlick is widely used by professionals for various video chats, training, and for recording the latest 3D games.

Advantages:

  • Offers a user-friendly and highly streamlined interface.
  • One-click audio control.

Disadvantages:

  • Users cannot adjust the quality of the recorded video files.

Screen Flow (Mac):

ScreenFlow provides a great Minecraft recording service with its ability to record audio from computer, multi-channel audio devices, external microphone, iOS device and video camera.

Advantages:

  • Useful for professional Minecraft players due to the efficient editing tools, animations, text, music and transitions.
  • Supports all common file formats and allows easy sharing on popular social media platforms.

Disadvantages:

  • Missing built-in templates.
  • It is very expensive to get access to all the features of this software.

Minecraft Screen Recorder for Android:

Mobizen Screen Recorder:

It is much easier to record Minecraft on Android platform with their easy-to-use tools. Mobizen is free to access with all the great features that make recording projects much easier. You will be pleased to know that Mobizen also allows users to remove watermark from videos and screenshots for free.

Advantages:

  • Easy to use with the free recording, editing and recording features.
  • Lots of customization options.
  • Supports 1080p resolution level with 60fps frame rate and 12Mbps setting.

Disadvantages:


AZ Screen Recorder:

AZ Screen Recorder offers an efficient recording service for Minecraft players with its ad-free environment. This can be used for free, also without any restrictions and does not even leave a watermark on recorded videos. AZ Screen Recorder does not require root access to your device.

Advantages:

  • It can record videos with HD and Full HD resolution settings.
  • Provides audio recording support with clear sound effects.

Disadvantages:

  • Annoying crashes have been reported.


Minecraft Screen Recorder for iOS:

AirShou:

AirShou is a popular screen recording program that works perfectly on all iOS devices. Packed with many advanced features, this application is capable of recording fast-paced action games without quality loss. All of the settings are fairly straightforward, allowing for easy control over stream adjustments.

Advantages:

  • Allows direct streaming to Shou.tv.
  • Great customization options.

Disadvantages:

  • People don’t like the red bar that stays on the top part of the screen during recording.

Dr.Fone:

Dr.Fone offers you smooth game recording on iOS platforms. It is 100% safe and fast with easy to use features. You will be happy to know that with Dr.Frone, you can enjoy real-time HD mirroring without any lag in Minecraft recording. It can also capture audio signals and the one-click launch option allows for easy recording.

Advantages:

  • Lots of customization settings to improve recording performance.
  • Support wireless mirroring service.
  • Hassle-free recording service with safe, easy and fast performance.

Disadvantages:

  • The use of all quality features is chargeable.
